verses.verse: And there came <WH935> <WH8799> two <WH8147> angels <WH4397> to Sodom <WH5467> at even <WH6153>; and Lot <WH3876> sat <WH3427> <WH8802> in the gate <WH8179> of Sodom <WH5467>: and Lot <WH3876> seeing <WH7200> <WH8799> them rose up <WH6965> <WH8799> to meet <WH7125> <WH8800> them; and he bowed <WH7812> <WH8691> himself with his face <WH639> toward the ground <WH776>;

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold now, my lords <WH113>, turn in <WH5493> <WH8798>, I pray you, into your servant's <WH5650> house <WH1004>, and tarry all night <WH3885> <WH8798>, and wash <WH7364> <WH8798> your feet <WH7272>, and ye shall rise up early <WH7925> <WH8689>, and go <WH1980> <WH8804> on your ways <WH1870>. And they said <WH559> <WH8799>, Nay; but we will abide <WH3885> in the street <WH7339> all night <WH3885> <WH8799>.

And he pressed <WH6484> <WH8799> upon them greatly <WH3966>; and they turned in <WH5493> <WH8799> unto him, and entered <WH935> <WH8799> into his house <WH1004>; and he made <WH6213> <WH8799> them a feast <WH4960>, and did bake <WH644> <WH8804> matzah <WH4682>, and they did eat <WH398> <WH8799>.

But before they lay down <WH7901> <WH8799>, the men <WH582> of the city <WH5892>, even the men <WH582> of Sodom <WH5467>, compassed <WH5437> the house <WH1004> round <WH5437> <WH8738>, both old <WH2205> and young <WH5288>, all the people <WH5971> from every quarter <WH7097>:

And they called <WH7121> <WH8799> unto Lot <WH3876>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Where are the men <WH582> which came in <WH935> <WH8804> to thee this night <WH3915>? bring them out <WH3318> <WH8685> unto us, that we may know <WH3045> <WH8799> them.
And Lot <WH3876> went out <WH3318> <WH8799> at the door <WH6607> unto them, and shut <WH5462> <WH8804> the door <WH1817> after him <WH310>,
And said <WH559> <WH8799>, I pray you, brethren <WH251>, do not so wickedly <WH7489> <WH8686>.

Behold now, I have two <WH8147> daughters <WH1323> which have not known <WH3045> <WH8804> man <WH376>; let me, I pray you, bring them out <WH3318> <WH8686> unto you, and do <WH6213> <WH8798> ye to them as is good <WH2896> in your eyes <WH5869>: only unto these <WH411> men <WH582> do <WH6213> <WH8799> nothing <WH408> <WH1697>; for therefore came <WH935> <WH8804> they under the shadow <WH6738> of my roof <WH6982>.

And they said <WH559> <WH8799>, Stand <WH5066> <WH8798> back <WH1973>. And they said <WH559> <WH8799> again, This one <WH259> fellow came in <WH935> <WH8804> to sojourn <WH1481> <WH8800>, and he will needs <WH8199> <WH8800> be a judge <WH8199> <WH8799>: now will we deal worse <WH7489> <WH8686> with thee, than with them. And they pressed <WH6484> <WH8799> sore <WH3966> upon the man <WH376>, even Lot <WH3876>, and came near <WH5066> <WH8799> to break <WH7665> <WH8800> the door <WH1817>.
But the men <WH582> put forth <WH7971> <WH8799> their hand <WH3027>, and pulled <WH935> <WH8686> Lot <WH3876> into the house <WH1004> to them, and shut <WH5462> <WH8804> to the door <WH1817>.

And they smote <WH5221> <WH8689> the men <WH582> that were at the door <WH6607> of the house <WH1004> with blindness <WH5575>, both small <WH6996> and great <WH1419>: so that they wearied <WH3811> <WH8799> themselves to find <WH4672> <WH8800> the door <WH6607>.

And the men <WH582> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Lot <WH3876>, Hast thou here <WH6311> any <WH4310> besides? son in Torah <WH2860>, and thy sons <WH1121>, and thy daughters <WH1323>, and whatsoever <WH834> thou hast in the city <WH5892>, bring them out <WH3318> <WH8685> of this place <WH4725>:

For we <WH587> will destroy <WH7843> <WH8688> <WH853> this place <WH4725>, because the cry of them <WH6818> is waxen great <WH1431> <WH8804> before <WH854> the face <WH6440> of the YY <WH3068>; and the YY <WH3068> hath sent <WH7971> <WH8762> us to destroy <WH7843> <WH8763> it.

And Lot <WH3876> went out <WH3318> <WH8799>, and spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto his sons in Torah <WH2860>, which married <WH3947> <WH8802> his daughters <WH1323>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Up <WH6965> <WH8798>, get you out <WH3318> <WH8798> of this place <WH4725>; for the YY <WH3068> will destroy <WH7843> <WH8688> this city <WH5892>. But he seemed as one that mocked <WH6711> <WH8764> unto <WH5869> his sons in Torah <WH2860>.

And when <WH3644> the morning <WH7837> arose <WH5927> <WH8804>, then the angels <WH4397> hastened <WH213> <WH8686> Lot <WH3876>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, take <WH3947> <WH8798> thy wife <WH802>, and thy two <WH8147> daughters <WH1323>, which are here <WH4672> <WH8737>; lest thou be consumed <WH5595> <WH8735> in the iniquity <WH5771> of the city <WH5892>.

And while he lingered <WH4102> <WH8698>, the men <WH582> laid hold <WH2388> <WH8686> upon his hand <WH3027>, and upon the hand <WH3027> of his wife <WH802>, and upon the hand <WH3027> of his two <WH8147> daughters <WH1323>; the YY <WH3068> being merciful <WH2551> unto him: and they brought him forth <WH3318> <WH8686>, and set him <WH3240> <WH8686> without <WH2351> the city <WH5892>.

And it came to pass, when they had brought them forth <WH3318> <WH8687> abroad <WH2351>, that he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Escape <WH4422> <WH8734> for <WH5921> thy life <WH5315>; look <WH5027> <WH8686> not behind thee <WH310>, neither stay <WH5975> <WH8799> thou in all the plain <WH3603>; escape <WH4422> <WH8734> to the mountain <WH2022>, lest thou be consumed <WH5595> <WH8735>.
And Lot <WH3876> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Oh, not so, my YY <WH113>:

Behold now, thy servant <WH5650> hath found <WH4672> <WH8804> grace <WH2580> in thy sight <WH5869>, and thou hast magnified <WH1431> <WH8686> thy mercy <WH2617>, which thou hast shewed <WH6213> <WH8804> unto me <WH5978> in saving <WH2421> <WH8687> my life <WH5315>; and I cannot <WH3201> <WH8799> escape <WH4422> <WH8736> to the mountain <WH2022>, lest some evil <WH7451> take <WH1692> <WH8799> me, and I die <WH4191> <WH8804>:

Behold now, this city <WH5892> is near <WH7138> to flee <WH5127> <WH8800> unto, and it <WH1931> is a little one <WH4705>: Oh, let me escape <WH4422> <WH8735> thither, ( is it not a little one <WH4705> ?) and my soul <WH5315> shall live <WH2421> <WH8799>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, See <WH2009>, I have accepted <WH5375> <WH8804> thee <WH6440> concerning this thing <WH1697> also, that I will not overthrow <WH2015> <WH8800> this city <WH5892>, for the which <WH834> thou hast spoken <WH1696> <WH8765>.

Haste <WH4116> <WH8761> thee, escape <WH4422> <WH8734> thither; for I cannot <WH3201> <WH8799> do <WH6213> <WH8800> any thing <WH1697> till thou be come <WH935> <WH8800> thither. Therefore the name <WH8034> of the city <WH5892> was called <WH7121> <WH8804> Zoar <WH6820>.
The sun <WH8121> was risen <WH3318> <WH8804> upon the earth <WH776> when Lot <WH3876> entered <WH935> <WH8804> into Zoar <WH6820>.
Then the YY <WH3068> rained <WH4305> <WH8689> upon Sodom <WH5467> and upon Gomorrah <WH6017> brimstone <WH1614> and fire <WH784> from the YY <WH3068> out of heaven <WH8064>;

And he overthrew <WH2015> <WH8799> those <WH411> cities <WH5892>, and all the plain <WH3603>, and all the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the cities <WH5892>, and that which grew <WH6780> upon the ground <WH127>.
But his wife <WH802> looked back <WH5027> <WH8686> from behind him <WH310>, and she became a pillar <WH5333> of salt <WH4417>.
And Avraham <WH85> gat up early <WH7925> <WH8686> in the morning <WH1242> to the place <WH4725> where he stood <WH5975> <WH8804> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>:

And he looked <WH8259> <WH8686> toward <WH6440> Sodom <WH5467> and Gomorrah <WH6017>, and toward <WH6440> all the land <WH776> of the plain <WH3603>, and beheld <WH7200> <WH8799>, and, lo, the smoke <WH7008> of the country <WH776> went up <WH5927> <WH8804> as the smoke <WH7008> of a furnace <WH3536>.

And it came to pass, when 'Elohim <WH430> destroyed <WH7843> <WH8763> the cities <WH5892> of the plain <WH3603>, that 'Elohim <WH430> remembered <WH2142> <WH8799> Avraham <WH85>, and sent <WH7971> <WH8762> Lot <WH3876> out of the midst <WH8432> of the overthrow <WH2018>, when he overthrew <WH2015> <WH8800> the cities <WH5892> in the which <WH2004> Lot <WH3876> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8804>.

And Lot <WH3876> went up <WH5927> <WH8799> out of Zoar <WH6820>, and dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in the mountain <WH2022>, and his two <WH8147> daughters <WH1323> with him; for he feared <WH3372> <WH8804> to dwell <WH3427> <WH8800> in Zoar <WH6820>: and he dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in a cave <WH4631>, he and his two <WH8147> daughters <WH1323>.

And the firstborn <WH1067> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the younger <WH6810>, Our father <WH1> is old <WH2204> <WH8804>, and there is not a man <WH376> in the earth <WH776> to come in <WH935> <WH8800> unto us after the manner <WH1870> of all the earth <WH776>:

Come <WH3212> <WH8798>, let us make <WH8248> our father <WH1> drink <WH8248> <WH8686> wine <WH3196>, and we will lie <WH7901> <WH8799> with him, that we may preserve <WH2421> <WH8762> seed <WH2233> of our father <WH1>.

And they made <WH8248> their father <WH1> drink <WH8248> <WH8686> wine <WH3196> that night <WH3915>: and the firstborn <WH1067> went in <WH935> <WH8799>, and lay <WH7901> <WH8799> with her father <WH1>; and he perceived <WH3045> <WH8804> not when she lay down <WH7901> <WH8800>, nor when she arose <WH6965> <WH8800>.

And it came to pass on the morrow <WH4283>, that the firstborn <WH1067> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the younger <WH6810>, Behold, I lay <WH7901> <WH8804> yesternight <WH570> with my father <WH1>: let us make him drink <WH8248> <WH8686> wine <WH3196> this night <WH3915> also; and go thou in <WH935> <WH8798>, and lie <WH7901> <WH8798> with him, that we may preserve <WH2421> <WH8762> seed <WH2233> of our father <WH1>.

And they made <WH8248> their father <WH1> drink <WH8248> <WH8686> wine <WH3196> that <WH1931> night <WH3915> also: and the younger <WH6810> arose <WH6965> <WH8799>, and lay <WH7901> <WH8799> with him; and he perceived <WH3045> <WH8804> not when she lay down <WH7901> <WH8800>, nor when she arose <WH6965> <WH8800>.
Thus were both <WH8147> the daughters <WH1323> of Lot <WH3876> with child <WH2029> <WH8799> by their father <WH1>.

And the firstborn <WH1067> bare <WH3205> <WH8799> a son <WH1121>, and called <WH7121> <WH8799> his name <WH8034> Moab <WH4124>: the same <WH1931> is the father <WH1> of the Moabites <WH4124> unto this day <WH3117>.

And the younger <WH6810>, she also bare <WH3205> <WH8804> a son <WH1121>, and called <WH7121> <WH8799> his name <WH8034> Benammi <WH1151>: the same is the father <WH1> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> unto this day <WH3117>.
